transcript:
I know some people that are still pissed
off for something that happened like 12
years ago that's a terrible thing to do
to yourself that's a terrible thing to
do to your body the reason why is
because one of the most important things
that we need to be aware of is how
memories can affect our bodies because
when you go through something anything
in life just think of something that was
terrible that happened to you in your
life think about what that felt like to
go through that thing if you were
cheated on somebody that you loved died
you know failing out of college being

wouldn't that suck to wake up and feel
